subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, May 30 — The Yankees cannot shake their injury problems. Johnny Damon said his right foot was getting more and more painful, and Gary Sheffield complained of soreness in his left wrist after batting practice on Tuesday. Neither outfielder started against the Tigers.
